# webServiceURL

**Instance Property**

The URL for the web service.

## Declaration

```swift
var webServiceURL: URL? { get }
```

## Discussion

The web service is for updating passes. For information about the web service protocol, see [https://developer.apple.com/library/archive/documentation/PassKit/Reference/PassKit_WebService/WebService.html#//apple_ref/doc/uid/TP40011988].

## Getting the web service information

- **authenticationToken**: The token for authenticating update requests.
